text: ohu 1981 warshaye sita wasarak niyojya adhyapana niladhari lesa dehiwala jathika sathwodyanaye sewaya kara thibe.
usas niladharin thidenek saha owun samaga ekathu wi mata erehiwa kriya karana kandayamak sitina bawatath thorathuru labi thibenawa.

dawena hada pun sandaka pahaya daka diya isiyi shiwa nawatha athara mada niyathayak wilasen law ginna 2011 aprel subhadra jayasundara > wali maluwa sithuwam kala kotiyak pa lakunu e'dawasa kalaye duwili thawaragena awasan sadhukarayata sarasena maranasanna araliya maleka paramal hina awilena dorana thel pusumbaa wiyaki dumbaulu pus ganda ma suwanda wunu golu nihanda wehera geya maha ghoshawak ma wiya e'asala diru paduru ketiyaka eraminiya gotha gena hindina waharuna himinamak eka'meka ganiyi nawagunawala upashantha wa nudure his paththarayata hisa powa iwakarana kalu kettu puru puru balaleku asala ma e'himi thaniyata lahaba obbehi sudu mahatha aluth sa lada pansalata danna handunana dayaka kala pita pare ma sakman karana parani puskola pothe akasharaya wanapoth karana'thara manga madum balmak lana un desa waharunu kettu himinama nirasha gunasekara > eksath jathinge sanwidhanaye lekamwaraya wana ban ki mun mahatha wisin path kala upadeshaka kamituwa nohoth widwath mandalaya thama warthawa pasugiya dinaka lekamwaraya atha path karanu labiya.

eheth ema rate pasugiya kalayedi itha darunu lesa mathdrawyata abbahiwima wadi wi athi athara ema uwadura nisa wishala sankhyawak warshikawa miyayayi, shri lankawe wasara 30k thibu lokaye darunuthama koti thrasthawadi yuddhaya nimakirima magin shrilankikayan dahas gananakage jiwitha beraganimata kriyakala mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathi athulu thriwidha hamudawe pradhaninta saha ema rajaya gath piyawara sambandhayen agaya kirimak nokota, eksath jathinge sanwidhanaye manawahimikam kawunsale pradhani al husen kumaru thawamath parikshana pawathwana athara warthamana shri lanka rajaya ohun wandaniya thaththwayata pathkaragena siti.

glis 581si aljiriyawen galguhawaka mitara 6k pamana usa jiwiyek sithuwamata naga thibi hamuwiya.mehi sitina jiwiyage hisa wishala wana athara eya kisiyam sarasillakin sithuwam kara atha.thawada sharirayada wishala we.bella asala kisiyam rali watunu sbhawayak atha.meyin gaganagamiyeku nirupanaya wana bawa pawaseyi.nepalayen hamu wu mema pirisi thatiye purana nepala wasiyan mema abhirahas pitasakwala jiwin sithuwamata naga athi bawa pene.pirisiyaka sithuwamata naguwe mowun piyabana pirisi wala nagi melowata pamina siti nisada..??eseth naththam ema jiwin daka thibena nisada..eseth naththam hithata aa sithuwillak nisada..??
